info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clark County through 700 PM CDT... At 630 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fordham Colony, or near Clark, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clark around 645 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Silver Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
